item.name: Finding beacons in a maze: turn left
hint.auto.noLeftTurn: You did not properly turn left
hint.auto.notMovedForward: You did not move at all???
hint.auto.doMoreThanTurnRight: Good start: you turned! But that is not enough ...
hint.auto.notKeptRightWall: You did not keep your hand to the right wall
hint.auto.leftAndRightConditionSwap: Check the order of your conditions. It can make a big difference!
